name: Horse Plinko (VR24 2021: Encore+ Demo)
description:
horse plinko is the first- third strand like game in the horse

the first horse-themed plinko game in the world. critics say "it really makes you feel like a horse", "where do i write horse plinko?", and "there's no plinko like horse plinko".

Horse plinko is considered a masterpeice in it's genere. a possible revolution in game design. this horse will be the 2nd most imporant horse to gaming after the skyrim horse.

featuring over 2 minutes of realistic horse sounds, this demo will be sure to delight your family and friends, and maybe even your neighbor. can you find all the secrets? maybe!

shardz reviews it 99/10, giving it astounding quotes such as “With it’s thrilling gameplay and incredible graphics, Horse Plinko is sure to amaze horse and Plinko lovers everywhere.”

come one, come all, and experience the unity made glory of horse plinko! :)

= = = COOL INFO = = =

Generously developed by Sophia Enzo Russillo to be featured as part of the VR24 2021: Encore+ charity event.

The public release of this demo was made possible by Atteug, who graciously donated the remainder of the donation goal for the Lexi's Internet Corner 2022 Extra Life Campaign.
